name: Talk To Me (wondder)
description:
Take full control of your life and your challenges - deal with your thoughts and emotions. With nobody’s help but your own!

Feel free to join us on discord to discuss the experience, every feedback is greatly appreciated!

What is Talk To Me?

Talk To Me is a tool that helps you to deal with your life challenges. It can be about life, work, relationships, pets, choice of clothes - you name it. And the best thing? All the answers come from you - no external meddling, nobody judging you, no guru manipulating you. But your own :)

During the experience you will speak with an advisor who will listen to your concerns. But the answers of the advisor will not be generated, you will step into the shoes of your advisor and listen to yourself from the advisor’s perspective. After answering to yourself as the advisor, you will switch bodies again to listen to the advisor's answer from your original perspective, and the conversation may continue as long as you'd wish.

Compatibility

This is a Virtual Reality experience that will work on the Oculus Quest 1&2.

Benefits

Thanks to Talk To Me, you will be able to experience a conversation with yourself. This is not only fun, but more importantly: it's scientifically researched and shown to help people successfully unpack any issues they might have on their minds.

Talk To Me helps you to deal with your thoughts and emotions, instead of thinking over and over on challenges without solutions, you can finally deal with those challenges. You’ll be able to identify what’s not working and why. Research shows that people typically give better advice to others than to themselves. Talk To Me allows you to give advice to yourself like you would to another person. This way you can benefit from the greatest advice possible - from yourself!

Finally, you will answer to yourself in the position of an experienced advisor, and the simple fact of being someone that looks smart and experienced helps to come up with reflected answers about challenges. Which often results in finding new solutions and ideas about how to deal with your life challenges.

Technical features

Talk To Me is using the latest features available in VR to create a realistic conversation. 

Current features in Talk To Me are:

  • Hand tracking (but you can still play with controllers)
  • Voice and movements recording
  • Full body avatar

We are actively working to add those features:

  • Improving the realism of hand tracking
  • Improving the customization to include different body shapes and more skin tones, hair colors etc.
  • Being able to record the whole experience to analyze it later
  • Being able to customize the avatars by uploading pictures  
  • Changing the user’s voice when the advisor is speaking the voice recording
Who are we?

 We are wondder, a Berlin-based startup. Our mission is to transform and empower people and organizations with Virtual Reality.

We combine cutting-edge technology with the latest scientific research and a great passion for innovation.

Help us

Any feedback is greatly appreciated! It is incredibly valuable for us to know what you think about the experience and what you would like to change or add. Helps us improve this application and be part of its creation!

If you’re keen to support us, you can do so by rating this experience, by joining our Discord or by sharing this experience!
